title: Mesa Verde National Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       MESA VERDE NATIONAL PARK IS OPEN DAILY, YEAR-ROUND.   Mesa Verde is always open, but opportunities vary from season to season. Click on one of the following links to learn what is available at the time of your visit.              2016 Visitor Services and Program Schedule, 2016 (8.5" x 14" pdf, 240 kb) Facilities: Hours of Operation, 2016 (8.5" x 11" pdf, 50 kb)    Please note: Due to continued safety concerns relating to rock falls, Spruce Tree House remains closed for the foreseeable future until a full geotechnical assessment can be performed. Overlooks near the museum offer superb views of the cliff dwelling. Rangers are available to answer questions.                   Download a Mesa Verde visitor guide to help you plan your visit to the park.         (To get the Free Adobe Reader, which is required to read the pdf files, click here.)
